Detailed Description

The header file describes the Low Proxy Interface API.

bool zgpCheckSinkInfoEmpty ( ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t *  gpEntry)

checks if Complete SinkInfo is empty

Parameters:
[in]- Ptr to ProxyTableEntry
Returns:
true - if entry is empty false - otherwise
bool zgpRemoveProxyPairingInfo ( ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t *  removeEntry,
ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t *  rxdEntyrInfo 
)

Removes proxy table entry pairing info.

Parameters:
[in]removeEntry- actual entry pairing info to be removed from rxdEntryInfo - reference entry(rxd in gp pairing cmd)
Returns:
true - after removing pairing info, entry becomes empty false - after removing pairing info, entry doesn't become empty
bool zgpUpdateProxyEntry ( ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t *  currentEntry,
ZGP_ProxyTableEntry_t *  entryInfo 
)

To update proxy entry.

Parameters:
[in]-currentEntry - entry to be updated entryInfo - reference entry
Returns:
true -If Entry is Updated Successfully false -If Entry is not updated Successfully(Can be due to Insufficinet Space)
